# id: JodaTimeContextHolder -> public static DateTimeFormatter getFormatter(DateTimeFormatter formatter, Locale locale)
commentText: Obtain a DateTimeFormatter with user-specific settings applied to the given base Formatter._@param formatter the base formatter that establishes default formatting rules_(generally user independent)_@param locale the current user locale (may be null if not known)_@return the user-specific DateTimeFormatter
